data.name: BUNKER
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the dark and scary story of an ordinary prisoner who has a chance to get out of a bunker where strange things happen. You will find a lot of interesting things, for example, the study of the bunker and the gradual disclosure of its history. Small puzzles that you will have to solve to try to get out to freedom. Hide-and-seek from creepy psychos who want to tear you to pieces. And remember the most important thing. You only have one life! Death in this game means that you will have to start all over again! The bunker is waiting for you.

Features:

- A terrifying bunker atmosphere that will keep you in suspense throughout the game.

- Interesting little puzzles that will make you think carefully about their solution.

- A beautiful soundtrack that will keep you on your toes throughout the game.

- Just one life!

data.short_description: A game in the genre of horror that will immerse you in the story of a prisoner who had a chance to try to get out of the bunker in which strange things happen. In the game you will have to solve small puzzles, learn the history of the game while reading diaries and of course hide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 1.8 Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 2900 с 512 Mb памяти
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Совместимая с DirectX Версия DirectX: 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 Ghz / AMD Phenom II X3 @ 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 480 / ATI Radeon HD 6970 с 1 Gb памяти
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Совместимая с DirectX Версия DirectX: 9.0c

content_descriptors.notes: The game has elements of dismemberment and a lot of blood.
